summary:
This will greatly improve penetration and size of bolts !
Forget about those little bolts floating in mid-air because this will change size of the bolts and penetration !
NOW SUPPORTS DJJOJO\'S DRAGONBONE AND DAEDRIC BOLTS IT WILL MAKE THEM LARGER, PENETRATING AND QUIVER BIGGER !
descriptionHtml:
***************************************************************************************************************
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/23318-1-1346269560.jpg[/img]

***************************************************************************************************************
REQUIRES DAWNGUARD !

WARNING : ALL OF THE FILES ARE RIGHTFULLY MINE I DID NOT COPY ANYTHING FROM ANY OTHER MODS !


Hi guys, so here is the mod that will replace those small bolts that only children play with !

As it says this will make bolts penetrate deep inside.
Both Dwarven and Steel bolt included 1.4v now supports daedric and dragonbone bolts !

In future I will be making unique crossbow bolts !

Bugs : Only one,to solve that bug I recommend downloading DJjojo\'s mods DOWNLOAD HIS MOD FIRST AND THEN OVERWRITE IT WITH MY MOD !
His mods : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22303]Dragonbone crossbow[/url]
               [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22113]Daedric crossbow[/url]

IT DOES NOT AFFECT ANY OTHER MOD, THIS MOD IS TOTALLY SAFE TO USE

Please Endorse and Vote It would be appreciated !

CHANGE LOG :

I PROUDLY PRESENT YOU VERSION 1.1
1.1- So in this version I made larger bolt quiver (Dwarven and steel included) and moved it
as close I could to the players body, i hope you guys enjoy !

1.2 V IS OUT !
1.2- I was thinking how can large bolts have only 14 damage points ? So here I am with 1.2v
Now bolts are going to make more damage !
Includes everything from previous versions !

1.3 !
1.3- This mod now supports DJjojo\'s Daedric bolts, you can have his mod or you don\'t need to have his mod, if you don\'t have his Daedric crossbow, bolts will be available to craft anyway with or without his mod, enjoy !

1.4 IS HERE !
1.4- Finally ! It supports both Dragonbone and Daedric bolts, and of course Dwarven and Steel ones, you don\'t need to download DJjojo\'s mod if you want only Dragonbone and Daedric bolt !
But I highly recommend to download his mods because of a little bug I have.

1.5v !
1.5- fixed all clipping issues + now I added more realistic bolt damage :
Steel bolt is weakest
Dwarven bolt is little stronger
Daedric bolt is now medium
And Dragonbone bolt is the strongest

1.6v
-It deletes my costum bolt damage and It is now compatible with Arrows and Bolts tweaks.

THANKS TO DJjojo FOR MAKING DAEDRIC AND DRAGONBONE CROSSBOW MOD !

I encourage people to take screenshots of their best penetrating shots !

QUIVERS :

**************************************************************************************************************
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/23318-1-1346272025.jpg[/img]

**************************************************************************************************************
**************************************************************************************************************
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/23318-2-1346272025.jpg[/img]

**************************************************************************************************************
 
***************************************************************************************************************
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/23318-2-1346258719.jpg[/img]
***************************************************************************************************************
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/23318-1-1346258719.jpg[/img]
***************************************************************************************************************
